name: @songhay/core
description: core, shared definitions for Angular applications

scripts.version:major: npm version major -m ":rocket: :snowflake: version major up to %s"
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m ":rocket: :snowflake: version minor up to %s"
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m ":rocket: :snowflake: version patch up to %s"
